analyzed: 西天譯經三藏朝散大夫試鴻臚少卿
translated: Tripiṭaka Master from the Western Regions, Chao-san-ta-fu Shih-hung-lu Shao-qing🔽Mingjiao Dashi, the subject Tianxizai respectfully translated

analyzed: 明教大師臣天息災奉　詔譯12 數珠儀則品數珠儀則品第十二爾時世尊釋迦牟尼。
translated: Chapter 12: The Rules for Using the Rosary. At that time, the World-Honored One Śākyamuni
observed the assembly of the Pure Light Heaven
and told the youth Mañjuśrī:
Mañjuśrī, listen attentively now.
For those who practice the true words and conduct,
reciting the true words for the sake of all sentient beings,
and the Dharma of equal accomplishment in all sūtras,
the rules for using the rosary and all true words,
you should listen attentively and receive them deeply in your mind.

original: 爾時妙吉祥童子聞是說已。
analyzed: 爾時妙吉祥童子聞是說已。
translated: At that time, the youth Mañjuśrī, having heard this,
addressed the World-Honored One, saying, Excellent, World-Honored One!
Please explain the practices of all true words,

original: 當令諸修行人及一切有情。
analyzed: 當令諸修行人及一切有情。
translated: so that all practitioners and sentient beings

original: 聞如是已皆悉能令獲得三昧。
analyzed: 聞如是已皆悉能令獲得三昧。
translated: Having heard this, they will all be able to attain samādhi.

original: 爾時世尊告妙吉祥童子言。
analyzed: 爾時世尊告妙吉祥童子言。
translated: At that time, the World-Honored One said to the youth Mañjuśrī,
Mañjuśrī, listen carefully, listen carefully!
I will now explain in detail for you.

original: 所有一切樂真言行諸有情等。
analyzed: 所有一切樂真言行諸有情等。
translated: For all sentient beings who delight in true mantra practices,

original: 若能清淨受持一心專精。
analyzed: 若能清淨受持一心專精。
translated: If they can uphold it purely with a single-pointed mind,
They will attain accomplishment in all meanings.
I will now recite the first mantra, saying:

original: 曩莫三滿哆沒駄引喃引阿進怛野二合引訥部二合哆嚕閉𧹞引怛儞也二合他引唵引俱嚕俱嚕薩哩嚩二合引囉他二合引娑引駄野娑駄野薩哩嚩二合努瑟吒二合尾謨引賀儞誐誐曩引末羅濕吠二合引尾戍引馱野娑嚩二合引賀引此真言若有行人。
analyzed: 曩莫三滿哆沒駄引喃引阿進怛野二合引訥部二合哆嚕閉𧹞引怛儞也二合他引唵引俱嚕俱嚕薩哩嚩二合引囉他二合引娑引駄野娑駄野薩哩嚩二合努瑟吒二合尾謨引賀儞誐誐曩引末羅濕吠二合引尾戍引馱野娑嚩二合引賀引此真言若有行人。
translated: Namo samanta buddhānāṃ aṃ ajñā nodanā rucira prabhe tadyathā oṃ kuru kuru sarva rakṣa sādhaya sādhaya sarva nusadha vimokṣa ni gaccha mara śvetu viśuddha svāhā. If there are practitioners of this mantra,
If one wishes to make a rosary,
all the things sought after will be purified.

original: 至於鑽磨貫穿種種受持。
analyzed: 至於鑽磨貫穿種種受持。
translated: Up to drilling, grinding, stringing, and various ways of wearing it,
all the things one does will be accomplished.
First, when seeing the rosary tree and about to pick it,

original: 先當加持彼樹及擁護自身。
analyzed: 先當加持彼樹及擁護自身。
translated: one should first empower that tree and protect one's own body.

original: 須專注誠心念此真言三十七遍。
analyzed: 須專注誠心念此真言三十七遍。
translated: One should single-mindedly recite this mantra thirty-seven times.
Then sleep under the tree for one night.
Seek the signs of good or bad responses.
If that person sees in a dream
that non-human appearing in an ugly and evil form,
that reciter should know it as it is.
Again, every day at dawn,
go under the tree and observe it.

original: 或更不見彼欲所採之珠。
analyzed: 或更不見彼欲所採之珠。
translated: If one does not see the rosary beads to be picked again,
this is a very inauspicious sign.

original: 彼持課人速當遠離彼樹。
analyzed: 彼持課人速當遠離彼樹。
translated: That reciter should quickly leave that tree
and go to another place to seek an auspicious tree.
There are many kinds of rosary trees.
The first is the seed of vajra.
The second is the seed of indra.
The third is the seed of bodhi.
The fourth is the seed of rudraksha.
And the seeds of other trees that are complete.
If you obtain these various seed trees,
You should first have a fellow practitioner climb the tree.

original: 若無同行人當自上樹選最上枝有子具足者。
analyzed: 若無同行人當自上樹選最上枝有子具足者。
translated: If there is no fellow practitioner, you should climb the tree yourself and select the uppermost branch that is complete with seeds.
Recite the previous mantra and empower it.

original: 彼上樹人每上樹時心不迷倒。
analyzed: 彼上樹人每上樹時心不迷倒。
translated: The person who climbs the tree should not be confused or overturned in their mind every time they climb the tree.
Up to their body and the tip of the branch,
Until they collect the seeds.
This is the supreme jewel.
I say this jewel is used for the supreme,
Obtaining the supreme accomplishment of the Dharma.
If you reach the middle branch and obtain the middling jewel,
You will attain the middling accomplishment of the Dharma.
If you reach the lower branch and obtain the lower jewel,

original: 當成就最下果報。🔽其子若是瘦屑。
analyzed: 當成就最下果報。 其子若是瘦屑。
translated: You will accomplish the lowest karmic retribution.🔽If the seeds are withered and worm-eaten,
They are all unfit for use.
If you obtain a seed from the western branch and make it into a bead,
you will attain accomplishment in the Dharma and obtain wealth and riches.
If you obtain a seed from the northern branch and make it into a bead,

original: 當得聖賢愛重夜叉及一切部多皆悉降伏。
analyzed: 當得聖賢愛重夜叉及一切部多皆悉降伏。
translated: you will be loved and respected by sages and worthies, and all yakshas and bhutas will be subdued.

original: 至於天人乃至乾闥婆緊那羅羅剎等皆悉降伏。
analyzed: 至於天人乃至乾闥婆緊那羅羅剎等皆悉降伏。
translated: Even gods, gandharvas, kinnaras, rakshasas, and so forth will all be subdued.
If you perform various activities according to the ritual,
all virtuous deeds will be enhanced.

original: 復得一切成就所求皆得。
analyzed: 復得一切成就所求皆得。
translated: You will also attain all accomplishments and obtain all that you seek.

original: 若得東枝復見彼枝有果見在。
analyzed: 若得東枝復見彼枝有果見在。
translated: If you obtain a branch from the east and see a fruit on that branch,
if you obtain that seed and make it into a bead,

original: 凡所修行持課行人得持明成就。
analyzed: 凡所修行持課行人得持明成就。
translated: all practitioners who uphold and recite will attain accomplishment in the vidya mantra.
They will accomplish various things and attain fulfillment.
If they single-mindedly uphold it, they will also obtain longevity.
If you obtain a long branch from the south without leaves,
although it has seeds, they cannot be made into beads.
If you make them into beads, it will harm the lives of many beings.

original: 故彼持課人當一心遠離。
analyzed: 故彼持課人當一心遠離。
translated: Therefore, the practitioner should be single-minded and keep away from them.
If the southern branch is not long or has leaves,
and there are seeds suitable for making beads,
the practitioner should also abandon them.
Because they can still kill enemies,

original: 若捨而不取乃獲福無量。
analyzed: 若捨而不取乃獲福無量。
translated: if they are abandoned and not taken, immeasurable blessings will be obtained.

original: 若得下枝長而下指乃至入地。
analyzed: 若得下枝長而下指乃至入地。
translated: If the lower branch is long and reaches down to the ground,
and that branch has seeds that can be made into beads,

original: 彼持課人當依儀軌專注受持。
analyzed: 彼持課人當依儀軌專注受持。
translated: the practitioner should follow the ritual and focus on receiving and upholding them.
The reciter, wherever it may be on the ground or in the mountains,
in any empty cave where asuras dwell,
the practitioner will be able to enter them all.

original: 與修羅男女同住於修羅宮中。
analyzed: 與修羅男女同住於修羅宮中。
translated: Dwelling together with the asura men and women in the asura palace,
for one eon they will experience the highest bliss.

original: 初於樹上得珠子已下樹之時。
analyzed: 初於樹上得珠子已下樹之時。
translated: At first, having obtained the seed beads on the tree and come down from the tree,

original: 彼持課人誦前真言而作擁護。
analyzed: 彼持課人誦前真言而作擁護。
translated: the practitioner recites the previous mantra to provide protection.

original: 當求清淨之處次第成作。
analyzed: 當求清淨之處次第成作。
translated: One should seek a pure place and gradually accomplish it.
Either oneself or others, according to one's wishes.

original: 隨彼遠近樂住之處或恒住處。
analyzed: 隨彼遠近樂住之處或恒住處。
translated: According to the distance and pleasant place to stay, or a permanent dwelling place.
When about to make it,

original: 宜先一一清潔身心專注。
analyzed: 宜先一一清潔身心專注。
translated: One should first purify one's body and mind, and focus one's attention.
Then take the beads, drill them, grind them, and polish them.
Recite the mantra for each one,

original: 或三遍或五遍或二十一遍。
analyzed: 或三遍或五遍或二十一遍。
translated: Either three times, five times, or twenty-one times.
After reciting the mantra, the wise ones say,
Now for such and such a matter, speak each word.

original: 呪願畢已乃得珠體清淨。
analyzed: 呪願畢已乃得珠體清淨。
translated: After finishing the mantra and blessings, the beads are then purified.
Also have a young girl twist the thread.

original: 而用五色絲合色如花鬘。
analyzed: 而用五色絲合色如花鬘。
translated: Use five-colored silk to twist the colors like a flower garland.
Either twist three times or five times.
According to the number of beads, they should be tightly twisted.

original: 智者選子切須勻好不得朽損及與缺減。
analyzed: 智者選子切須勻好不得朽損及與缺減。
translated: The wise ones select the beads, which must be even and good, not rotten, damaged, or incomplete.
They should all be round and fine, which is the best.

original: 彼菩提子金剛子印捺羅子槵子等。
analyzed: 彼菩提子金剛子印捺羅子槵子等。
translated: Bodhi seeds, vajra seeds, indranīla seeds, rudrākṣa seeds, etc.

original: 及用別子一一揀選殊妙上等。
analyzed: 及用別子一一揀選殊妙上等。
translated: And use other seeds, each selected as extremely wonderful and superior.

original: 彼持課人要當一心專注成辦。
analyzed: 彼持課人要當一心專注成辦。
translated: The person who recites and practices must single-mindedly focus on accomplishing this.

original: 此外或用金銀真珠水精硨磲碼碯。
analyzed: 此外或用金銀真珠水精硨磲碼碯。
translated: In addition, it may be made of gold, silver, pearls, crystal, agate, and coral.
And various kinds of precious treasures.
Or use the supreme maṇi jewel, etc.

original: 必須圓滿肥潤勿令缺減。
analyzed: 必須圓滿肥潤勿令缺減。
translated: It must be perfectly plump and not lacking.

original: 凡貫穿時攝心專注不得散亂。
analyzed: 凡貫穿時攝心專注不得散亂。
translated: When stringing it, one must focus the mind and not be distracted.

original: 珠成之後所有求願疾得靈應。
analyzed: 珠成之後所有求願疾得靈應。
translated: After the beads are completed, all wishes will be quickly answered.

original: 若無前來諸色樹子珍寶等物。
analyzed: 若無前來諸色樹子珍寶等物。
translated: If there are no seeds of various trees, precious treasures, etc., as mentioned above,
It can also be made by knotting auspicious grass.
The number of beads is not fixed and there are also three grades.
The superior grade has 108.
The middle grade has 54.
The lower grade has 27.

original: 別有最上品當用一千八十為數。
analyzed: 別有最上品當用一千八十為數。
translated: There is also the supreme grade, which should have 1,080 beads.

original: 復有用金銀銅鐵鍮石鉛錫等鑄。
analyzed: 復有用金銀銅鐵鍮石鉛錫等鑄。
translated: Some use gold, silver, copper, iron, brass, lead, tin, etc. to cast.
Some are cast with one, two, or three kinds of metal.

original: 唯求堅牢圓滿勿令缺減。
analyzed: 唯求堅牢圓滿勿令缺減。
translated: Only seek solidity and completeness, do not allow any defects.

original: 仍須光明瑩淨如寶瓔珞。
analyzed: 仍須光明瑩淨如寶瓔珞。
translated: Still, it must be radiant and pure like a precious necklace.

original: 凡持課行人當須持戒清淨。
analyzed: 凡持課行人當須持戒清淨。
translated: All practitioners of recitation should uphold pure precepts.
Then, go to a river with long flowing water.
And bathe in other clean water until completely pure.

original: 然將數珠先以淨土揩摩後用水洗。
analyzed: 然將數珠先以淨土揩摩後用水洗。
translated: Then, rub the rosary with clean soil and wash it with water.

original: 然後復用五香水洗。🔽復以上妙塗香及上色白栴檀香。
analyzed: 然後復用五香水洗。 復以上妙塗香及上色白栴檀香。
translated: Then, wash it again with the five kinds of scented water.🔽Then, use the most wonderful scented paste, white sandalwood incense of the best color,

original: 及恭俱摩等香水摩拭竟。
analyzed: 及恭俱摩等香水摩拭竟。
translated: and scented water such as kunkuma to rub and wipe it.

original: 彼持課行人將此珠就詣佛像處。
analyzed: 彼持課行人將此珠就詣佛像處。
translated: The practitioner of recitation will take this rosary to the place of the Buddha image.
The Buddha image may be sculpted or painted.

original: 當求最上嚴飾第一等像釋迦牟尼佛人天之師。
analyzed: 當求最上嚴飾第一等像釋迦牟尼佛人天之師。
translated: Seek the most beautifully adorned, first-class image of Shakyamuni Buddha, the teacher of humans and gods.

original: 依於佛言結其地界安置佛像。
analyzed: 依於佛言結其地界安置佛像。
translated: In accordance with the Buddha's words, establish the boundary of the ground and place the Buddha image.
In front of that Buddha, sit upright with the body straight.

original: 一心專注誦真言一千八十遍。
analyzed: 一心專注誦真言一千八十遍。
translated: Single-mindedly concentrate on reciting the mantra 1,080 times.
Or 108 times.

original: 以兩手捧奉上本師釋迦牟尼佛。
analyzed: 以兩手捧奉上本師釋迦牟尼佛。
translated: With both hands, offer it to the original teacher, Śākyamuni Buddha.
After offering to the Buddha,
Simply place the pearl in front of the Buddha.
When releasing the pearl, it forms a circular altar shape.
Or like a coiled snake.
The practitioner should stay up all night.
Simply on the ground in front of the Buddha,
Spread grass to sleep and seek the previous signs.

original: 若於夢中得見佛及辟支佛聲聞等相。
analyzed: 若於夢中得見佛及辟支佛聲聞等相。
translated: If in a dream one sees the Buddha, pratyekabuddhas, śrāvakas, and other such appearances,
Whatever one seeks will definitely be accomplished.
If one sees a young boy,

original: 及見幼小童子種種相貌。
analyzed: 及見幼小童子種種相貌。
translated: And sees various appearances of a young child,
And receives the offering of a rosary,

original: 彼持課人於陀羅尼得一切成就。
analyzed: 彼持課人於陀羅尼得一切成就。
translated: The practitioner will attain all accomplishments in the dhāraṇī.

original: 或別見善相而於所求一切易得。
analyzed: 或別見善相而於所求一切易得。
translated: Or if one separately sees auspicious signs, then whatever one seeks will be easily attained.

original: 13 護摩品大方廣菩薩藏文殊師利根本儀軌經護摩品第十三爾時世尊釋迦牟尼佛。
analyzed: 13 護摩品大方廣菩薩藏文殊師利根本儀軌經護摩品第十三爾時世尊釋迦牟尼佛。
translated: At that time, the World-Honored One, Śākyamuni Buddha,
again observed the assembly of the Pure Light Heaven,
and said to the youth Mañjuśrī,

original: 妙吉祥今當廣說妙真言句護摩等事最上儀則。
analyzed: 妙吉祥今當廣說妙真言句護摩等事最上儀則。
translated: Mañjuśrī, I will now extensively explain the sublime mantra phrases, homa and other matters, the supreme methods.
If there are those who rely on and practice, they will attain the accomplishment of the vidyādhara.

original: 所有安居火天微妙諸行最上儀則我今當說。
analyzed: 所有安居火天微妙諸行最上儀則我今當說。
translated: I will now explain the subtle practices and supreme methods of the fire god's abode.

original: 云何彼一切行人持明修行等事。
analyzed: 云何彼一切行人持明修行等事。
translated: How should all practitioners, vidyādhara practitioners, and others practice?

original: 我今先說祕密火心真言曰。
analyzed: 我今先說祕密火心真言曰。
translated: I will now first explain the secret fire heart mantra, which states:

original: 唵烏底瑟姹二合賀哩冰誐羅路呬哆引乞叉二合禰呬捺那引波野吽𠷑吒𠷑吒薩哩嚩尾覲曩二合曩舍野薩嚩二合引賀引妙吉祥此是火天最上心明。
analyzed: 唵烏底瑟姹二合賀哩冰誐羅路呬哆引乞叉二合禰呬捺那引波野吽𠷑吒𠷑吒薩哩嚩尾覲曩二合曩舍野薩嚩二合引賀引妙吉祥此是火天最上心明。
translated: Oṃ udīṣaṇa hṛiṃ agni ruiśa kṣaṇi nihi nābha pāya hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ sarva vīja nāsaya svāhā. O Mañjuśrī, this is the supreme heart mantra of the fire god.

original: 若有所作欲得一切成就。
analyzed: 若有所作欲得一切成就。
translated: If one wishes to accomplish anything,

original: 常當先須持念此大火天心明。
analyzed: 常當先須持念此大火天心明。
translated: One should always first recite this great fire deity's heart mantra.
Empower ghee with it three times and perform homa.
Invite the fire deity and it will surely descend.

original: 若有行人依法修行作三種事。
analyzed: 若有行人依法修行作三種事。
translated: If there are practitioners who practice according to the Dharma and perform three kinds of activities,

original: 所謂息災增益降伏等事。
analyzed: 所謂息災增益降伏等事。
translated: Namely, pacifying, increasing, and subduing,

original: 所使乾濕柴木長短厚薄用不用法。
analyzed: 所使乾濕柴木長短厚薄用不用法。
translated: The dry and wet firewood to be used, long or short, thick or thin, and the methods of using and not using,

original: 凡息災法當用無憂樹柴。
analyzed: 凡息災法當用無憂樹柴。
translated: For pacifying rites, one should use firewood from the aśoka tree.

original: 其柴可長一尺二尺厚可三指仍須潤澤。
analyzed: 其柴可長一尺二尺厚可三指仍須潤澤。
translated: The firewood can be one foot or two feet long, three fingers thick, and still moist.
Use it according to the Dharma and one will surely obtain auspiciousness.
If it is withered, half-burned,
Or eaten by insects, it is not suitable for use.

original: 或使葉者須得綠色及白色者。
analyzed: 或使葉者須得綠色及白色者。
translated: If using leaves, they should be green or white.

original: 若是黑色及有半燒蟲竅等。
analyzed: 若是黑色及有半燒蟲竅等。
translated: If they are black, half-burned, or have holes from insects,
They are also not suitable for use.
The homa hearth should also not be too high.

original: 凡作爐處須選勝地清淨之處。
analyzed: 凡作爐處須選勝地清淨之處。
translated: Wherever a hearth is made, one must choose a superior place, a pure place.

original: 成就山間或河岸邊或安居地。
analyzed: 成就山間或河岸邊或安居地。
translated: It can be accomplished in the mountains, or on the banks of a river, or in a dwelling place.

original: 或寒林或空舍並可為作。
analyzed: 或寒林或空舍並可為作。
translated: Or in a cold forest, or in an empty house, it is suitable to make it.

original: 或是深山頂空伽藍大曠野處亦得。
analyzed: 或是深山頂空伽藍大曠野處亦得。
translated: Or it can be on the top of a deep mountain, in an empty monastery, or in a great wilderness, it is also acceptable.

original: 此等處是諸佛如來所說最上修行之處。
analyzed: 此等處是諸佛如來所說最上修行之處。
translated: These places are said to be the best places for practice by the Buddhas and Tathagatas.
Having chosen the place,

original: 其地先須掘深一肘或三四肘已來。
analyzed: 其地先須掘深一肘或三四肘已來。
translated: one must first dig to a depth of one cubit or three or four cubits.

original: 除去其中一切不祥之物。
analyzed: 除去其中一切不祥之物。
translated: Remove all inauspicious things from within.

original: 若是一生清淨之地無諸雜穢。
analyzed: 若是一生清淨之地無諸雜穢。
translated: If it is a pure place that has been clean for one life and is free from various defilements,
just dig to a depth of one cubit.
Further, seek good soil to fill it inside.
The hearth is only two cubits wide.
Either round, square, or half-moon shaped.
Mud plaster the perimeter and make a lotus border.
In the middle, place a three-pronged vajra.
Having placed the vajra,

original: 仍備一切護摩所用之物。
analyzed: 仍備一切護摩所用之物。
translated: further prepare all the things needed for homa.

original: 復作草座薦去壇一肘安置。
analyzed: 復作草座薦去壇一肘安置。
translated: Again, make a grass seat and place it one cubit away from the altar.

original: 持課行人於薦上坐作護摩事。
analyzed: 持課行人於薦上坐作護摩事。
translated: The practitioner of dhāraṇī sits on the seat to perform homa.

original: 彼人求最上事速成就者。
analyzed: 彼人求最上事速成就者。
translated: If that person seeks the most supreme matter and wishes for quick accomplishment,

original: 先須自心決定不生疑慮。🔽若作息災當面東坐。🔽作增益者當面北坐。
analyzed: 先須自心決定不生疑慮。 若作息災當面東坐。 作增益者當面北坐。
translated: he must first make up his mind and not give rise to doubt.🔽If performing pacifying rites, one should sit facing east.🔽If performing enriching rites, one should sit facing north.
If performing subjugating rites, one should sit facing south.

original: 彼持課人若欲所作成就者。
analyzed: 彼持課人若欲所作成就者。
translated: If the practitioner of dhāraṇī wishes to accomplish what he is doing,
he must always recite without interruption.

original: 作護摩時。🔽使用尾羅樹柴阿哩迦柴。
analyzed: 作護摩時。 使用尾羅樹柴阿哩迦柴。
translated: When performing homa,🔽use wood from the virā tree, wood from the arika tree,
wood from the bharja tree, and wood from the niḥkurvara tree.
All of the above woods must be moist.
For pacifying, enriching, and other uses.
If performing subjugating rites, use dry and withered wood.

original: 若阿摩樹柴及一頭尖者。
analyzed: 若阿摩樹柴及一頭尖者。
translated: If using wood from the amra tree or wood with one pointed end,
all are not allowed.
If performing enriching, pacifying, and other matters,
If there is no wet firewood, use dry firewood instead.

original: 用時即使軟嫰青吉祥草周遍纏裹。
analyzed: 用時即使軟嫰青吉祥草周遍纏裹。
translated: When using, wrap it with soft, tender, green auspicious grass all around.
Green in color, soft and moist, like a peacock's neck.
Such a method is considered the constant standard.

original: 其草若赤及乾枯者亦不得用。
analyzed: 其草若赤及乾枯者亦不得用。
translated: If the grass is red or dry and withered, it should not be used.

original: 若使用者我說此人獲無量罪。
analyzed: 若使用者我說此人獲無量罪。
translated: If one uses it, I say that person will incur immeasurable offenses.

original: 作護摩時求恒常清淨無蟲之水以為灑淨。
analyzed: 作護摩時求恒常清淨無蟲之水以為灑淨。
translated: When performing homa, seek constantly pure water without insects to use for sprinkling.

original: 當周遍灑三匝已著火天處。
analyzed: 當周遍灑三匝已著火天處。
translated: Sprinkle all around three times, then place it in the fire deity's place.

original: 復以草一握已來為一束。
analyzed: 復以草一握已來為一束。
translated: Then take one bundle of grass, one bundle.
Place it near the hand, and light the fire.
Before it is lit, do not blow on it with the mouth.

original: 及用觸衣觸葉及用手等。
analyzed: 及用觸衣觸葉及用手等。
translated: And do not use the contact robe, contact leaves, or hands, etc.

original: 扇火須用扇子及清淨衣物扇火。
analyzed: 扇火須用扇子及清淨衣物扇火。
translated: When fanning the fire, use a fan and a pure cloth to fan the fire.

original: 其火著已持課行人。🔽為護摩等引三遍時得灑淨。
analyzed: 其火著已持課行人。 為護摩等引三遍時得灑淨。
translated: After the fire is lit, the practitioner who holds the recitation.🔽When performing homa and other recitations three times, one may sprinkle.

original: 以右手作護摩取團食三擲。
analyzed: 以右手作護摩取團食三擲。
translated: With the right hand, perform homa and take three handfuls of food.
And throw in ghee, milk, and food offerings.
Recite the root mantra.
Pay homage to the original teacher Shakyamuni Buddha.
And pay homage to all Buddhas as one wishes.

original: 次持誦火天心真言一七遍請彼火天。
analyzed: 次持誦火天心真言一七遍請彼火天。
translated: Next, recite the heart mantra of the fire god one hundred and eight times to invite the fire god.
Again, invite with excellent incense and flowers.

original: 彼持誦人與智者坐位坐。
analyzed: 彼持誦人與智者坐位坐。
translated: The mantra practitioner and the wise one sit in their seats.
Do not use a separate mantra.

original: 先以稻穀花蜜酪等相和。
analyzed: 先以稻穀花蜜酪等相和。
translated: First, mix rice grains, honey, and curds,

original: 搵濕柴三片作護摩火天。
analyzed: 搵濕柴三片作護摩火天。
translated: and use them to moisten three pieces of firewood to perform homa for the fire god.
If it is for increasing benefits or mantra matters,
both ends should be moistened.

original: 將欲作法事誦真言或一洛叉。
analyzed: 將欲作法事誦真言或一洛叉。
translated: When about to perform the ritual or recite the mantra, either one laksha,
or one thousand and eight, or one hundred and eight times,
from the beginning of the recitation,
recite once and throw a piece of firewood into the fire.
Continue until the number is completed without interruption.

original: 所使柴及酪乳蜜等須預備辦。
analyzed: 所使柴及酪乳蜜等須預備辦。
translated: The firewood, curds, milk, honey, and so on that are used must be prepared in advance.
Do not lack any when performing the ritual.

original: 作護摩者先須知火煙焰色相。
analyzed: 作護摩者先須知火煙焰色相。
translated: One who performs homa must first know the characteristics of the fire, smoke, and flames.
The auspicious and inauspicious methods of accomplishment.
If one performs a pacifying homa,
the flames blaze intensely and are also gathered into one,
and without smoke, these are auspicious signs.
Increasing benefits are also like this.

original: 有煙者降伏法非吉祥相。
analyzed: 有煙者降伏法非吉祥相。
translated: Having smoke is an inauspicious sign for subjugating methods.
It is not protected by the Buddha.
If it is pacifying and one obtains white flames,
this is the most supreme auspicious sign.
One will obtain mantra accomplishment in the tasks one undertakes.
If it is red, one will obtain increasing benefits and accomplishment.
If the smoke is red-black,
one will also obtain the three kinds of accomplishment.
If it is the color of clouds and various other signs,

original: 彼所作事及真言皆不能成就。
analyzed: 彼所作事及真言皆不能成就。
translated: the tasks one undertakes and the mantras will all be unable to succeed.
When the flames blaze intensely,

original: 於中或見大地色及種種相。
analyzed: 於中或見大地色及種種相。
translated: one may see the color of the earth and various other signs within them.
Again, as before, start according to the Dharma.
And perform recitation and homa, etc.

original: 如吉相現當得真言成就。
analyzed: 如吉相現當得真言成就。
translated: If auspicious signs appear, one will attain mantra accomplishment.

original: 先所說曼拏羅儀則及作護摩。
analyzed: 先所說曼拏羅儀則及作護摩。
translated: The previously explained mandala procedures and homa rites,

original: 請召發遣火天等事所有真言。
analyzed: 請召發遣火天等事所有真言。
translated: Inviting, dispatching, and other matters related to the fire deity, etc., all the mantras,

original: 皆是過去諸佛如來親所宣說。
analyzed: 皆是過去諸佛如來親所宣說。
translated: Are personally expounded by the Buddhas and Tathagatas of the past.

original: 若有行人能於彼佛像前。
analyzed: 若有行人能於彼佛像前。
translated: If there are practitioners who can, in front of those Buddha images,
With a sharp mind, free from doubt and worry,

original: 誦彼真言如數滿足決定成就。
analyzed: 誦彼真言如數滿足決定成就。
translated: Recite those mantras as instructed, they will definitely attain accomplishment.
If the practitioner has,

original: 先有世間一切罪業不清淨事。
analyzed: 先有世間一切罪業不清淨事。
translated: Previously, worldly misdeeds and impure matters,

original: 佛未加護當須重重懺謝。
analyzed: 佛未加護當須重重懺謝。
translated: The Buddha has not yet bestowed protection, so they must repeatedly repent and apologize.
With a sincere mind, recite, and later they will surely attain accomplishment.
If, in front of the images, the mind is uninterrupted,
Constantly reciting or performing homa,
All previous matters can be known.

original: 當來獲得菩薩位及五通天轉輪聖王等。
analyzed: 當來獲得菩薩位及五通天轉輪聖王等。
translated: In the future, they will attain the stage of a Bodhisattva, the five supernatural powers, and become a wheel-turning sage king, etc.
One can also become the lord of the underworld.

original: 亦得為虛空長壽抱𭢽切身天。
analyzed: 亦得為虛空長壽抱𭢽切身天。
translated: One can also become a long-lived celestial being in the sky.

original: 及得夜叉夜叉女及阿修羅眾降伏。
analyzed: 及得夜叉夜叉女及阿修羅眾降伏。
translated: And one can subdue the yakshas, yaksha women, and asura hordes.
And one can subdue various ghosts and spirits.
And one can obtain the great devas.

original: 乃至菩薩摩訶薩十地之位。
analyzed: 乃至菩薩摩訶薩十地之位。
translated: Up to the stage of the tenth ground of the bodhisattva-mahāsattva.

original: 彼持課行人若恒持誦不間斷及作護摩者。
analyzed: 彼持課行人若恒持誦不間斷及作護摩者。
translated: If the practitioner always recites without interruption and performs homa,
They will accomplish worldly matters.

original: 至於增益息災降伏三種之事。
analyzed: 至於增益息災降伏三種之事。
translated: As for the three kinds of matters, increasing benefits, pacifying, and subduing,
They will definitely attain the supreme accomplishment.

original: 得見果報中下品事不為難也。
analyzed: 得見果報中下品事不為難也。
translated: It is not difficult to obtain the middling and inferior matters among the karmic fruits.
When the practitioner performs homa,

original: 當結五髻印誦枳世儞真言。
analyzed: 當結五髻印誦枳世儞真言。
translated: They should form the five-bunched chignon mudrā and recite the Kshitigarbha mantra.
Do all matters and protect one's own body.

original: 誦此真言七遍或八遍此為恒式。
analyzed: 誦此真言七遍或八遍此為恒式。
translated: Recite this mantra seven or eight times, this is the constant rule.
The mantra states:

original: 曩莫薩哩嚩二合沒馱冒地薩怛嚩二合引曩引摩鉢囉二合底賀哆誐𡦔切身誐哆引喃引怛𭀍切身他引唵引入嚩二合羅底瑟吒二合吽牛鳴音呼嚕嚕尾濕嚩二合三婆嚩三婆吠引娑嚩二合引賀引此真言用加持柴及花香塗香一切護摩物等。
analyzed: 曩莫薩哩嚩二合沒馱冒地薩怛嚩二合引曩引摩鉢囉二合底賀哆誐𡦔切身誐哆引喃引怛𭀍切身他引唵引入嚩二合羅底瑟吒二合吽牛鳴音呼嚕嚕尾濕嚩二合三婆嚩三婆吠引娑嚩二合引賀引此真言用加持柴及花香塗香一切護摩物等。
translated: This mantra is used to empower firewood, flowers, incense, unguents, and all homa substances.
Recite two or seven times.
Recite once and throw in the fire pit once.
Even the sprinkling water must be empowered.

original: 凡所作念誦護摩一切諸事。
analyzed: 凡所作念誦護摩一切諸事。
translated: All recitation and homa practices.

original: 依起首次第不失當求成就。
analyzed: 依起首次第不失當求成就。
translated: Following the sequence of the ritual, one should seek accomplishment.
First, form the great mudrā of the five topknots.
And recite the mantra of Kṣitigarbha.
While protecting, begin the recitation.
One will attain all accomplishments and wisdom.

original: 若或得見祥瑞及妙善聲。
analyzed: 若或得見祥瑞及妙善聲。
translated: If one sees auspicious omens and wondrous good sounds,

original: 彼人得成就真言施願彼諸行人先所求事。
analyzed: 彼人得成就真言施願彼諸行人先所求事。
translated: That person will attain the accomplishment of the mantra and the fulfillment of their wishes. Those practitioners who have previously sought after things,
Those who recite mantras,
They will attain all accomplishments.

original: 若護摩中得鼓音殊勝妙聲。
analyzed: 若護摩中得鼓音殊勝妙聲。
translated: If in the homa one obtains the sound of a drum, a wondrous and excellent sound,

original: 彼持誦人得說護摩事一切處成就。
analyzed: 彼持誦人得說護摩事一切處成就。
translated: That reciter will be able to perform homa rites and attain accomplishment in all places.

original: 若復有祥瑞殊勝妙音飛禽種種聲相。
analyzed: 若復有祥瑞殊勝妙音飛禽種種聲相。
translated: If there are again auspicious omens, wondrous and excellent sounds, and various sounds of flying birds,
I say that these sounds are auspicious and propitious.

original: 復聞諸天適悅種種言音。
analyzed: 復聞諸天適悅種種言音。
translated: Moreover, one hears the various delightful voices of the devas,

original: 及現天蓋幢幡天女莊嚴之相。
analyzed: 及現天蓋幢幡天女莊嚴之相。
translated: And sees the adornments of celestial maidens such as parasols, banners, and pennants.
And obtains the auspicious sight of a full vase of arghya water,

original: 乃至復見世間最上無數色相。
analyzed: 乃至復見世間最上無數色相。
translated: And further sees the most supreme and innumerable forms in the world.

original: 此是種種真言法成就之相。
analyzed: 此是種種真言法成就之相。
translated: This is the sign of the accomplishment of various mantra methods.

original: 14 曼拏羅成就法大輪一字明王畫像儀則品大方廣菩薩藏文殊師利根本儀軌經曼拏羅成就法大輪一字明王畫像儀則品第十四爾時世尊復觀察淨光天眾。
analyzed: 14 曼拏羅成就法大輪一字明王畫像儀則品大方廣菩薩藏文殊師利根本儀軌經曼拏羅成就法大輪一字明王畫像儀則品第十四爾時世尊復觀察淨光天眾。
translated: Chapter 14: The Method of Accomplishing the Maṇḍala, the Ritual Procedures for Painting the Great Wheel One Syllable Vidāraṇa King, the Sūtra of Mañjuśrī's Fundamental Ritual Procedures from the Bodhisattva Canon of the Vairocana Buddhâvataṃsaka Sūtra, Chapter 14: The Method of Accomplishing the Maṇḍala, the Ritual Procedures for Painting the Great Wheel One Syllable Vidāraṇa King At that time, the World-Honored One again observed the pure light celestial beings.
He told Mañjuśrī Kumārabhūta:

original: 汝妙吉祥有祕密明成就法。
analyzed: 汝妙吉祥有祕密明成就法。
translated: You, Mañjuśrī, have the method of accomplishing secret mantras.

original: 是一切真言中大真言智如來法藏法雲。
analyzed: 是一切真言中大真言智如來法藏法雲。
translated: This is the great mantra wisdom among all mantras, the Dharma treasury and Dharma cloud of the Tathāgata.
It enters the nature of space of all mantras.

original: 於世間出世間為最上師。
analyzed: 於世間出世間為最上師。
translated: It is the supreme teacher in the mundane and supramundane worlds.

original: 妙吉祥譬如如來正等正覺調御丈夫天人師佛世尊。
analyzed: 妙吉祥譬如如來正等正覺調御丈夫天人師佛世尊。
translated: Mañjuśrī, it is like the Tathāgata, the Worthy of Offerings, the Perfectly Enlightened One, the Supremely Well-Gone One, the Knower of the World, the Unsurpassed One, the Tamer of Men, the Teacher of Gods and Men, the Buddha, the World-Honored One.

original: 於一切有情中為最尊第一之師。
analyzed: 於一切有情中為最尊第一之師。
translated: Among all sentient beings, he is the most venerable and foremost teacher.
Kumārabhūta, likewise, among all mantras,
this vidyā-rāja is the foremost.

original: 乃是過去恒河沙等無數如來最上之說。
analyzed: 乃是過去恒河沙等無數如來最上之說。
translated: This is the supreme teaching of the innumerable Tathāgatas of the past, as numerous as the sands of the Ganges River.
The Buddha, the World-Honored One, the Jewel Banner Tathāgata,

original: 內心最上祕密一切吉祥法。
analyzed: 內心最上祕密一切吉祥法。
translated: The supreme secret in the mind, the Dharma of all auspiciousness,

original: 諸佛讚歎能施一切眾生無畏。
analyzed: 諸佛讚歎能施一切眾生無畏。
translated: Praised by the Buddhas, able to bestow fearlessness upon all sentient beings,

original: 滅一切罪令一切眾生所願圓滿。
analyzed: 滅一切罪令一切眾生所願圓滿。
translated: Eliminating all sins, enabling all sentient beings to fulfill their wishes.

original: 云何世尊釋迦牟尼眉間毫相放大光明。
analyzed: 云何世尊釋迦牟尼眉間毫相放大光明。
translated: Why did the World-Honored One Śākyamuni emit a great radiance from the white tuft of hair between his eyebrows,
Inviting the Tathāgatas of the ten directions?

original: 彼光所照十方上下一切佛剎。
analyzed: 彼光所照十方上下一切佛剎。
translated: The radiance illuminated the entire Buddha-lands of the ten directions,
And all the sentient beings dwelling there,
Were illuminated by the radiance and all experienced bliss.

original: 其光復還入世尊釋迦牟尼佛頂。
analyzed: 其光復還入世尊釋迦牟尼佛頂。
translated: The radiance then returned and entered the crown of the World-Honored One Śākyamuni Buddha.
On the crown of the World-Honored One's head, there was a great blazing radiance,
Universally illuminating all sentient beings.

original: 出忿怒大力種種色相圓光莊嚴身大輪一字王明王。
analyzed: 出忿怒大力種種色相圓光莊嚴身大輪一字王明王。
translated: It emitted the wrathful, powerful, various-colored, circular halo-adorned body of the Great Wheel One Syllable King Dhāraṇī.

original: 出已光照一切虛空上下一切明王。
analyzed: 出已光照一切虛空上下一切明王。
translated: Having emerged, the light illuminates all the upper and lower directions of the sky and all the vidyarajas.

original: 復有百千俱胝那由他眷屬圍繞。
analyzed: 復有百千俱胝那由他眷屬圍繞。
translated: There are also hundreds of thousands of koṭis of nayutas of retinue surrounding them.

original: 以一切世間出世間供養。
analyzed: 以一切世間出世間供養。
translated: With all worldly and supramundane offerings,
They make offerings and praise the Great Wheel Vidyaraja.

original: 為一切真言力安住一切佛。
analyzed: 為一切真言力安住一切佛。
translated: For the sake of the power of all mantras, they abide in all buddhas.
They abide in all the bodhisattvas of the ten grounds.

original: 以最上寶滿一切虛空上下悉皆莊嚴。
analyzed: 以最上寶滿一切虛空上下悉皆莊嚴。
translated: With the supreme jewels filling all the upper and lower directions of the sky, they are all adorned.
They also adorn their bodies with great maṇi jewels.

original: 化百千俱胝那由他種種相光淨端嚴。
analyzed: 化百千俱胝那由他種種相光淨端嚴。
translated: They transform into hundreds of thousands of koṭis of nayutas of various appearances, pure and dignified,
Reciting the sound of the one-syllable mantra themselves.
They emit great light and flames of great light.

original: 於世尊釋迦牟尼佛上面前虛空中瞻敬而住。
analyzed: 於世尊釋迦牟尼佛上面前虛空中瞻敬而住。
translated: They stand in the sky in front of the World-Honored One Śākyamuni, looking up at him with respect.

original: 而彼光明照淨光天一切大眾。
analyzed: 而彼光明照淨光天一切大眾。
translated: And that light illuminates the entire assembly of the Śuddhâvāsa gods.

original: 爾時世尊釋迦牟尼佛言。
analyzed: 爾時世尊釋迦牟尼佛言。
translated: At that time, the World-Honored One Śākyamuni Buddha said:
This one-syllable mantra of the Great Wheel of Mine,

original: 是一切寶幢如來內心最上祕密能於彼佛像前以猛利心。
analyzed: 是一切寶幢如來內心最上祕密能於彼佛像前以猛利心。
translated: This is the supreme secret of the mind of the Tathāgata of All Jewel Banners. In front of that Buddha image, with a fierce mind,
Do not give rise to doubt and recite that mantra.

original: 如數滿足決定成就。🔽彼持課行人若是身邊。
analyzed: 如數滿足決定成就。 彼持課行人若是身邊。
translated: If the number is fulfilled, one will definitely attain accomplishment.

original: 先有世間一切罪業不清淨事。
analyzed: 先有世間一切罪業不清淨事。
translated: If the practitioner has previously had all kinds of worldly offenses and impure matters,
The Buddha has not yet bestowed protection.

original: 當須重重懺謝誠心持誦。
analyzed: 當須重重懺謝誠心持誦。
translated: One must repeatedly repent and sincerely recite the mantra.
Later, one will definitely be able to attain accomplishment.
If in front of the image, the mind is uninterrupted,

original: 恒時持誦或作護摩一切前事。
analyzed: 恒時持誦或作護摩一切前事。
translated: Always reciting or performing homa, all previous matters,
Can all be known.
In the future, one will attain the stage of a bodhisattva,
As well as the five supernatural powers, the heavenly wheel-turning sage king, and so forth.
One will also become the lord of the underworld.

original: 亦得為虛空長壽抱𭢽切身天。
analyzed: 亦得為虛空長壽抱𭢽切身天。
translated: One will also attain long life as a celestial being in the sky, and a body.
And one will be able to subdue the yakṣas, yakṣa females,
And the asura multitudes.
And one will be able to subdue all ghosts and spirits, and so forth.
And attain the great devas,

original: 乃至菩薩摩訶薩十地之位。
analyzed: 乃至菩薩摩訶薩十地之位。
translated: Up to the stage of the ten grounds of the bodhisattva-mahāsattvas.

original: 彼持課行人若恒持誦不間斷及作護摩者。
analyzed: 彼持課行人若恒持誦不間斷及作護摩者。
translated: If the practitioner of dhāraṇī recitation always recites without interruption and performs homa,
They will accomplish worldly matters.

original: 至於增益息災降伏三種之事。
analyzed: 至於增益息災降伏三種之事。
translated: As for the three kinds of matters, increasing benefits, pacifying, and subduing,
They will definitely attain the supreme accomplishment.

original: 得見果報中下品事不為難也。
analyzed: 得見果報中下品事不為難也。
translated: It will not be difficult to see the middling and inferior matters of karmic retribution.

original: 彼行人作護摩時當結五髻印誦枳世儞真言作一切事擁護自身誦此真言七遍或八遍此為恒式真言曰。
analyzed: 彼行人作護摩時當結五髻印誦枳世儞真言作一切事擁護自身誦此真言七遍或八遍此為恒式真言曰。
translated: When the practitioner performs homa, they should form the five-knot mudrā and recite the Kṣitigarbha mantra to accomplish all matters and protect themselves. Recite this mantra seven or eight times, as this is the constant method. The mantra states:

original: 曩莫薩哩嚩二合沒駄冒地薩怛嚩二合引曩引摩鉢囉二合底賀哆誐𡦔切身誐哆引喃引怛𭀍切身他引唵引入嚩二合羅底瑟咤二合吽牛鳴音呼嚕嚕尾濕嚩二合三婆嚩三婆吠引娑嚩二合引賀引此真言用加持柴及花香塗香一切擁護。
analyzed: 曩莫薩哩嚩二合沒駄冒地薩怛嚩二合引曩引摩鉢囉二合底賀哆誐𡦔切身誐哆引喃引怛𭀍切身他引唵引入嚩二合羅底瑟咤二合吽牛鳴音呼嚕嚕尾濕嚩二合三婆嚩三婆吠引娑嚩二合引賀引此真言用加持柴及花香塗香一切擁護。
translated: Namo sarva-buddha-bodhisattva-mahā-prati-sa-ra-ka-sattvānāṃ tathāgata-namaḥ oṃ pra-ti-sa-ra pra-ti-sa-ra hūṃ ru ru viśva-saṃ-bhava svāhā. This mantra is used to empower firewood, flowers, incense, and unguents for all-encompassing protection.
I, in the presence of all Tathāgatas of the Jeweled Banner,
Attained the Buddha Śākyamuni,

original: 無量壽佛努鉢囉娑賀佛。
analyzed: 無量壽佛努鉢囉娑賀佛。
translated: Amitābha Buddha, and Nupoluoshe Buddha.

original: 妙眼佛妙幢佛。🔽花王佛蘇閉那多佛。
analyzed: 妙眼佛妙幢佛。 花王佛蘇閉那多佛。
translated: Sublime Eye Buddha, Sublime Banner Buddha,🔽Flower King Buddha, Subinaduo Buddha,
Rukmangada Buddha, and Kanakamuni Buddha,
And all past Perfectly Awakened Ones,

original: 悉皆隨喜宣說彼一字大輪明。
analyzed: 悉皆隨喜宣說彼一字大輪明。
translated: All joyfully proclaimed the great wheel mantra of one syllable.

original: 彼明云何所謂唵部林二合妙吉祥此是一切如來第一微妙內心。
analyzed: 彼明云何所謂唵部林二合妙吉祥此是一切如來第一微妙內心。
translated: What is that light? It is called Om Bhrum. This is the most subtle inner mind of all Tathagatas.
It is called the Great Auspicious Great Wheel One Syllable Mantra.

original: 若有求者得一切真言成就。
analyzed: 若有求者得一切真言成就。
translated: If there is one who seeks, they will attain the accomplishment of all mantras.

original: 汝妙吉祥此最上儀軌王。
analyzed: 汝妙吉祥此最上儀軌王。
translated: You, Manjushri, this is the supreme king of rituals.

original: 是一切真言最上祕密勅。
analyzed: 是一切真言最上祕密勅。
translated: This is the most secret command of all mantras.

original: 若持誦者所有一切業障皆得清淨。
analyzed: 若持誦者所有一切業障皆得清淨。
translated: If the reciter has any karmic hindrances, they will all be purified.

original: 誦者當先誦三洛叉遍數滿足時。
analyzed: 誦者當先誦三洛叉遍數滿足時。
translated: The reciter should first recite three lakh times. When the number is fulfilled,
Child, this king of rituals of yours.

original: 於一切世出世一切法一切真言儀軌皆得成就。
analyzed: 於一切世出世一切法一切真言儀軌皆得成就。
translated: In all worldly and transcendent dharmas, and in all mantra rituals, it will bring accomplishment.
If you perform protection, you will be able to conceal your body.

original: 入一切部多中無所障礙。
analyzed: 入一切部多中無所障礙。
translated: You will enter all the assemblies without obstruction.

original: 於世間出世間不能為害。
analyzed: 於世間出世間不能為害。
translated: In the worldly and transcendent realms, you will not be harmed.
At that time, the World-Honored One Shakyamuni Buddha.

original: 說是大輪一字明王持誦儀軌時。
analyzed: 說是大輪一字明王持誦儀軌時。
translated: When he spoke this Great Wheel One Syllable Mantra King Recitation Ritual,

original: 三千大千一切世界六種震動。
analyzed: 三千大千一切世界六種震動。
translated: The entire trichiliocosm shook in six ways.
The light illuminated all buddha-lands.
All tathāgatas in those buddha-lands

original: 悉皆集會彼淨光天眾會而坐。
analyzed: 悉皆集會彼淨光天眾會而坐。
translated: gathered in the assembly of the Pure Light Heaven and took their seats.

original: 彼一切佛剎所有眾生之類光所照者。
analyzed: 彼一切佛剎所有眾生之類光所照者。
translated: All kinds of beings in those buddha-lands who were illuminated by the light

original: 得大福德及得聲聞辟支佛。
analyzed: 得大福德及得聲聞辟支佛。
translated: attained great merit and the stage of śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: 乃至令得菩薩十地不退轉位。
analyzed: 乃至令得菩薩十地不退轉位。
translated: They were caused to attain the stage of nonretrogression on the ten grounds of bodhisattvas.
Up to unsurpassed perfect supreme enlightenment.

original: 復有無量無邊世界無數眾生。
analyzed: 復有無量無邊世界無數眾生。
translated: Furthermore, in innumerable worlds, countless beings

original: 在於地獄餓鬼傍生苦趣住者。
analyzed: 在於地獄餓鬼傍生苦趣住者。
translated: who were dwelling in the miserable realms of hell, hungry ghosts, and animals

original: 蒙彼大明王大光明所照觸者。
analyzed: 蒙彼大明王大光明所照觸者。
translated: were touched by the great light of the Great Vidyārāja.
They all attained liberation from suffering and distress.
They experienced great joy and bliss, and immeasurable delight.

original: 當來決定獲得三乘之位。
analyzed: 當來決定獲得三乘之位。
translated: In the future, they will definitely attain the stage of the three vehicles.
At that time, the World-Honored One, Śākyamuni Buddha,
again observed the great assembly🔽and said to the youth Mañjuśrī:
Mañjuśrī!
Listen attentively, young man, to this Great Wheel Wrathful King.
He has great power and is fearless in all ways.
Any practitioner who recites him will have their wishes fulfilled.

original: 得入一切真言法廣大儀軌。
analyzed: 得入一切真言法廣大儀軌。
translated: They will be able to enter the vast ritual manuals of all mantra methods.
They will be able to accomplish all mantras.
They will enable sentient beings to be endowed with equality.
They will have great diligence and understand all skillful means.
They will attain the highest wisdom and progress towards enlightenment.
Sitting in the place of practice, they will attain great nirvana.

original: 復次說廣大畫像儀則曼拏羅成就法。
analyzed: 復次說廣大畫像儀則曼拏羅成就法。
translated: Next, I will explain the method for accomplishing the maṇḍala of the vast painted image.

original: 若有如前安住真言行人。
analyzed: 若有如前安住真言行人。
translated: If there is a practitioner who abides in the mantra practice as described above,

original: 求成就大輪明王未曾有法。
analyzed: 求成就大輪明王未曾有法。
translated: seeking to accomplish the unprecedented method of the Great Wheel Wrathful King,

original: 於一切真言最上自在有大力勢。
analyzed: 於一切真言最上自在有大力勢。
translated: the supreme and sovereign mantra with great power,
able to fulfill all wishes,

original: 能破壞世間一切災難如佛現世。
analyzed: 能破壞世間一切災難如佛現世。
translated: able to destroy all calamities in the world as if the Buddha were present in the world,
if seeking middling or inferior matters,
all will be accomplished and they will attain great peace and happiness.
It is extremely peaceful and destroys all evil karma.
Young man, this Great Wheel King of Spells

original: 於諸世間是天中天最上佛日。
analyzed: 於諸世間是天中天最上佛日。
translated: Is the god among gods in all worlds, the supreme Buddha-sun.

original: 名一切法自性智真如際最上儀軌。
analyzed: 名一切法自性智真如際最上儀軌。
translated: It is called the supreme ritual of the limit of suchness of the wisdom of the nature of all dharmas.
All practitioners should receive it with sincerity.

original: 若欲畫者先當以正心專注。
analyzed: 若欲畫者先當以正心專注。
translated: If one wishes to draw it, one should first focus one's mind with utmost sincerity.

original: 求最上白㲲勻細新好鮮白無垢。
analyzed: 求最上白㲲勻細新好鮮白無垢。
translated: Seek the best white cotton cloth, even and fine, new and fresh, spotless.
Any silk fabric is not to be used.
The cloth should be one cubit wide and two cubits long.

original: 若無當用樹皮無蟲蝕者。
analyzed: 若無當用樹皮無蟲蝕者。
translated: If there is none, use tree bark free from insect damage.

original: 所求畫人必須長者清淨之士。
analyzed: 所求畫人必須長者清淨之士。
translated: The person who seeks to draw it must be a pure and virtuous elder.
Do not haggle over the price, give what is asked.
On the day of beginning to draw,
One must do it on an auspicious day in the three long months.

original: 畫人當先沐浴清淨著鮮潔衣。
analyzed: 畫人當先沐浴清淨著鮮潔衣。
translated: The painter should first bathe and purify himself, wear fresh clean clothes.
Internally and externally corresponding, sincere and focused.

original: 仍與受三歸五戒然後起首。
analyzed: 仍與受三歸五戒然後起首。
translated: Then bestow the three refuges and five precepts before beginning.
First, draw the appearance of the main deity Buddha.
The body is golden in color with a halo all around.
Sitting in a great jeweled mountain and a great jeweled niche.
Broad and proportionate.

original: 而用真珠雜寶瓔珞寶鬘莊嚴。
analyzed: 而用真珠雜寶瓔珞寶鬘莊嚴。
translated: Adorned with pearl necklaces, various jeweled necklaces, and jeweled garlands.
Adorned with various jewels inside and out.
Above the Buddha's head, draw a parasol alone.
Adorned with various jewels.
Above the parasol, draw two flying immortals holding the parasol.
On the Buddha's right side, draw the practitioner.

original: 其寶山根下周迴四面畫大海水。
analyzed: 其寶山根下周迴四面畫大海水。
translated: At the base of the jeweled mountain, draw the great ocean surrounding on all four sides.

analyzed: 山從海出。 像前周遍。
translated: The mountain emerges from the ocean.

original: 畫曩誐枳娑羅花奔曩誐花。🔽嚩俱羅花喻體迦花。🔽摩羅迦花俱蘇摩花。
analyzed: 畫曩誐枳娑羅花奔曩誐花。 嚩俱羅花喻體迦花。 摩羅迦花俱蘇摩花。
translated: In front of the image, draw Nāgakesara flowers, punnāga flowers,🔽vakula flowers, yūthikā flowers,

original: 必哩焰虞花俱嚕嚩花。🔽印捺嚩藍花燥誐地花。
analyzed: 必哩焰虞花俱嚕嚩花。 印捺嚩藍花燥誐地花。
translated: mallikā flowers, jasmine flowers,🔽bilva flowers, kurabaka flowers,
indīvara flowers, and various flowers such as sajota flowers and punarnavā flowers.

original: 復以如是等花及眾妙香。
analyzed: 復以如是等花及眾妙香。
translated: And with these flowers and various wonderful fragrances,
Mix them to make argha and offer them as offerings.

original: 所畫本尊當如迦尼迦花瞻蔔迦花色相具足。
analyzed: 所畫本尊當如迦尼迦花瞻蔔迦花色相具足。
translated: The painted deity should be like the kanika flower and champak flower, with complete appearance.
Or like golden color, extremely wonderful and incomparable.

original: 或畫寶勝佛或畫大福最上寶幢牟尼佛得一切法寶自在佛。
analyzed: 或畫寶勝佛或畫大福最上寶幢牟尼佛得一切法寶自在佛。
translated: Either paint Ratnasaṃbhava Buddha or paint Mahāpuṇya-agra-ratna-dhvaja-muni Buddha, who has attained mastery over all Dharma treasures.

original: 於大寶山大寶龕中結跏趺坐。
analyzed: 於大寶山大寶龕中結跏趺坐。
translated: Sitting cross-legged in a great jeweled cave in a great jeweled mountain.
Using blue lotus flowers to adorn the jeweled cave.
That Buddha's facial features are compassionate and dignified.
Forming the Dharma-expounding mudrā and displaying the appearance of granting fearlessness.
Outside the cave, paint the practitioner.
Bare his right shoulder and place his right knee on the ground.
Holding an incense burner in his hand, he looks up and makes offerings.

original: 山根四面畫大海水山從海出。
analyzed: 山根四面畫大海水山從海出。
translated: On the four sides of the mountain base, paint the great ocean and the mountain emerging from the ocean.
In this painting, the practitioner
Should recite according to the rules and methods.
Performing that increase and benefit, all that is sought will be obtained.
I will now explain the maṇḍala deities.
When the reciter recites,
they will all be able to understand.
The mantra to be recited must always be thoroughly mastered.

original: 及得灌頂真言儀軌。🔽妙吉祥此所說曼拏羅具足受灌頂法。
analyzed: 及得灌頂真言儀軌。 妙吉祥此所說曼拏羅具足受灌頂法。
translated: And one must obtain the abhiṣeka and the mantra ritual.🔽Mañjuśrī, this maṇḍala that is explained is complete with the abhiṣeka method.

original: 此灌頂曼拏羅一切真言皆能知解。
analyzed: 此灌頂曼拏羅一切真言皆能知解。
translated: In this abhiṣeka maṇḍala, all mantras can be known and understood.
Always recite and protect oneself.
And protect those who practice together.

original: 灌頂大師阿闍梨必須戒行具足。
analyzed: 灌頂大師阿闍梨必須戒行具足。
translated: The abhiṣeka great master ācārya must be complete in precepts and conduct.
Have great wisdom and be endowed with the marks of merit and virtue.
Be gentle in body and mind and compassionate towards sentient beings.

original: 恒為一切有情說於大乘。
analyzed: 恒為一切有情說於大乘。
translated: Always speak the Mahāyāna for all sentient beings.

original: 凡所攝受弟子不過八人多即遠離。
analyzed: 凡所攝受弟子不過八人多即遠離。
translated: The disciples to be accepted should not exceed eight, more would be too many.
The maṇḍala ritual as explained before,

original: 皆是一切如來之所宣說。
analyzed: 皆是一切如來之所宣說。
translated: is all that is proclaimed by all tathāgatas.
You must respect and always practice it.

original: 大方廣菩薩藏文殊師利根本儀軌經卷第十一
analyzed: 大方廣菩薩藏文殊師利根本儀軌經卷第十一
translated: Mahāvaipulya Bodhisattva Canon Mañjuśrī Root Ritual Tantra, Scroll 11
